DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to analyze the effectiveness and the cost-effectiveness of telecoching in improving glyceamic control and other modifiable risk factors in patients with type 2 diabetes compared to usual care only.
DOC.brief_title: Telecoaching of People With Type 2 Diabetes in Primary Care
DOC.criteria: patients with type 2 diabetes between 18 and 75 years old on the day of the selection Debilitating coexisting medical condition (e.g. dialysis, mental illness, cancer) Residents of long term care facilities Pregnancy Incapable of telephone communication in Dutch
